title: Reported for playing vlad in URF
body:
The whole enemy team reported me for playing {{champion:8}}  in urf, is this fair?
Can they report me for playing {{champion:8}} ?

replies.body: Lol, they can't report you for playing my fav Vladdy, they're probably just mad because you turned URF into a pool party. {{champion:8}}

pool party vlad heh....
**Vomits**

But if they replaced the blood with water it would avtually be really cool, first thing i imagined was vlad bombing a pool then turning it all into blood
Haha, yes his w is a pool of water, lets put us some poolparty ziggs in there, floating in his pooltoy
that would work really well tbh. could have a shadow of vlad swimming while in his pool, new E is a giant water bomb, i imagine him in 1700 styles swimsuit lol
they swam naked in the 1700's.. so its not that... but i can see him in the 1900'sred and white striped swimwear
why dont they make  him carry like a lil poolparty ziggs plushy on his shoulder xD
ooooh, pool party Vlad skin needs to be made @Rito pls
Yeah I've been thinking about that recently, pool party is one of my favorite skin lines, and if Vlad got a PP skin I'd spend all my money on that.
pool party  zed. He throws water balloons and his w effect is water kinda like gliding through the air. Idk hehe

This is actually a pretty cool idea.

His q is as usual sucking blood from his foes and his w turns him into water. His e would be throwing water balloons and his r would be a whirlpool that is surrounded by rubber duckys that would get sucked in as the ult finishes :D {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
You area  legend, #Rito make it so!

> [{quoted}](name=Damocracy,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=yIXp7MyW,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-04-22T22:07:19.925+0000)
>
> The whole enemy team reported me for playing {{champion:8}}  in urf, is this fair?
> Can they report me for playing {{champion:8}} ?

Umm, does it matter if they report you? Does it hurt?

Oh look, reported again rito. Why make URF if people can just report you for carrying your team with a  pub stomper like vlad. Not cool rito, not cool at all.
#StopTheReports
They can report you all they want. False reports will be thrown out, and will reduce the weight of further reports by those players. You won't be punished for picking an OP champ in URF.
